header.title: Matt School
header.description: The first architecture school in Iraq, providing professional courses in architectural design, modeling, and advanced software training.

features.title: Professional Training

features.title: Modern Software

features.title: Small Groups
features.description: Personalized attention with maximum 10 students per class for optimal learning

features.description: Morning and evening classes available to suit your schedule
